sentences.en: a fishing net
sentences.cn: 渔网

sentences.en: All bank and building society interest is paid net.
sentences.cn: 所有银行和建房互助协会的贷款都要支付纯利息。

sentences.en: Armstrong drove the ball into the roof of the net.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗将球打入球门网顶。

sentences.en: At the year end, net assets were £18 million.
sentences.cn: 到年底，净资产达1,800万英镑。

sentences.en: Bruce spends most evenings surfing the Net (= looking at information in different places on the Internet ).
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯晚上大多在网上浏览信息。

sentences.en: For the prior year, they reported net income of $1.1 million.
sentences.cn: 他们公布上一年度纯收入为110万美元。

sentences.en: He let the ball slip through his grasp and into the net.
sentences.cn: 球从他的掌中滑出，钻进了球门。

sentences.en: He volleyed the ball spectacularly into the far corner of the net.
sentences.cn: 他一脚漂亮的凌空抽射，把球踢进了球门的远角。

sentences.en: I threw aside my mosquito net and jumped out of bed.
sentences.cn: 我把蚊帐甩到一边，跳下床来。

sentences.en: Net profits slumped by 41%.
sentences.cn: 净利润暴跌了41%。

sentences.en: No one knows how many people currently surf the Net.
sentences.cn: 没人知道现在有多少人在网上冲浪。

sentences.en: Ramsay blasted the ball into the back of the net.
sentences.cn: 拉姆齐劲射入网。

sentences.en: she slipped through the net of all the care agencies.
sentences.cn: 所有的护理机构都把她疏忽了。

sentences.en: The ball bobbled into the back of the net.
sentences.cn: 球蹦到了球网背面。

sentences.en: The ball bounced crazily over his shoulder into the net.
sentences.cn: 球不可思议地弹过他的肩膀，钻进了球网。

sentences.en: The company reported a net loss of $56 million last year.
sentences.cn: 公司报告去年净亏损5,600万美元。

sentences.en: The group had a net profit margin of 30% last year.
sentences.cn: 去年，这个集团的纯利润率为30%。

sentences.en: The net profit (= after taxes, costs etc ) was up 16.3% last month.
sentences.cn: 上个月净利润增长了16.3%。

sentences.en: The security forces are casting their net wider.
sentences.cn: 安全部队正在更广泛地布网。

sentences.en: The United States is a net importer of beef (= it imports more than it exports ).
sentences.cn: 美国是牛肉净进口国。

sentences.en: There was a net outflow of about £50m in short-term capital.
sentences.cn: 短期资金净流出额大约为5,000万英镑。

sentences.en: Vernon estimates the company’s net worth at over $8 billion.
sentences.cn: 弗农估算公司的资产净值超过80亿美元。

sentences.en: We netted three fish in under an hour.
sentences.cn: 不到一小时我们就网住了三条鱼。

words.tran_cn: 把…织成网；用网捕捉（net的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 净现值，现在净价值；纯现价
净销售额；扣除销货折扣和退货后净额

trans.tran_en: the net amount is the final amount that remains after all the other amounts have been taken away
the system that allows millions of computer users around the world to exchange information
to hit or kick the ball into the net in sport

trans.tran_cn: 用网捕，捕获，净赚，踢入球门
trans.tran_en: to earn a particular amount of money as a profit after tax has been paid
